column1: Little Goat Diner////After going to girl and the goat
column2: I was very disappointed with Little Goat. My boyfriend and I came here for lunch on a whim when we were in the city. We loved Girl and the Goat and figured we would love this retro diner from the same owner. However
column3: the service left more to be desired and the food wasn't anywhere near as good as Girl and the Goat. A little coffee area is conjoined with the diner. I didn't try the coffee
column4: but it looked really cute and we decided to wait in that area.
